Miscellaneous Highlights: JJ Redick hired Nate McMillan and Scott Brooks as his assistant coaches without realizing their history of a 1993 playoff brawl.
Others: The brawl was sparked by a confrontation between McMillan and Brooks during a Game 5 matchup between the Seattle SuperSonics and the Houston Rockets in 1993.
McMillan and Brooks have since put the past behind them and are now working together as assistants for the Los Angeles Lakers.
